long_description: The STM Velo 2 Laptop shoulder bag is a sleek and stylish travel companion, easily storing your laptop and all accessories needed for a full day's work. Tough, durable polyester fabric stands up to constant use; polyethylene foam pads the laptop compartment and shoulder strap, protecting your computer and ensuring comfort. Side-entry laptop compartment lets you access your computer without having to dig into the entire bag. Zippered fleece-lined front drop pocket safely guards your phone, sunglasses or media player, and other essentials like keys or wallet. Exterior zip side pockets carry water bottles/umbrella. Padded, adjustable shoulder strap provides hands-free portage while you're on the go; waist strap stabilizes the load. Top grab handle lets you carry the bag like a briefcase. Zippered sleeve slides over rolling luggage pull handle for easy companion wheeling. The STM Velo 2 laptop shoulder bag's front flap secures closed with 2 quick-release buckles.
short_description: The STM Velo 2 Laptop shoulder bag is a sleek and stylish travel companion, easily storing your laptop and all accessories needed for a full day's work.
